snippet: Scarlett Johansson has resigned her post as a good-will ambassador for Oxfam International, the charity organization, because of her recent agreement to become an endorser for SodaStream, and more news.
lead_paragraph: Scarlett Johansson has resigned her post as a good-will ambassador for Oxfam International, the charity organization, because of her recent agreement to become an endorser for SodaStream, and more news.

headline.main: News From the Advertising Industry for the Week of Feb. 3
headline.print_headline: News From the Advertising Industry for the Week of Feb. 3
